task.title: Single select lists
task.shortdesc: Use specific keyboard commands to navigate single select lists by keyboard, screen reader, or a combination of both.

step.cmd: Navigate the single select list with a screen reader:

substep.cmd: Navigate to Single Select List in any application. Lists of radio buttons are displayed.
Use the Tab key to give focus to the radio button.
Press the Enter key to select the radio button. When users press Enter to make a selection, JAWS also enters the FORMS MODE.
Use the Up Arrow and Down Arrow keys to navigate through the items in the Single Select List and to change the selection.

step.cmd: Navigate the single select list without using a screen reader:

substep.cmd: Navigate to Single Select List in any application. Lists of radio buttons are displayed.
Use the Tab key to give focus to the radio button.
Press the Space bar to select the radio button.
Use the Up Arrow and Down Arrow keys to navigate through the items in the Single Select List and to change the selection.
